name: Too big to be called a Sword - Trijam #166
name_original: Too big to be called a Sword - Trijam #166
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim Sword

Every enemy you kill makes your sword grow.
Survive as long as you can and avoid the purple squares.

If your sword touches the purple squares you lose.

If you touch the yellow squares you lose.

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #166

Theme: Upgrade your weapon

I will try to add sound and art to my next entry  :)
